document.full_text: leftist ollanta humala is forecast to win the first round of peru's tight presidential election on sunday and face right-winger keiko fujimori in a run-off, two new polls showed on thursday.
document.title: humala seen facing fujimori in peru run-off
lines_and_colors: leftist ollanta humala is forecast to win the first round of peru's tight presidential election on sunday and face right-winger keiko fujimori in a run-off, two new polls showed on thursday.
